tier.item: (286) Tas jau butu loti jauki, ja baronese Holti butu teikusi ja.
this PTC would-be very nice if countess Holti would have-said
Un tagad es lai gaidu, kamer jus noraida vel kada cita?
and now I PTC wait while you rejectPASS yet any other
'It would have been nice if countess Holti had accepted you but she rejected you.
And now I should wait until you are rejected by the next one?
